nodes.text: Emlita was a female Nautolan who worked as a medium armor merchant during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war, she operated a stall in the Ambassador Commons' Alien Enclave Market in the city Voss-Ka on the planet Voss. Emlita wore grey clothing while at her stall. She had green skin, no hair and black eyes.

Emlita first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game she serves as a Republic and Imperial medium armor vendor on the planet Voss. Her location is also marked on a map in Prima Games' Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
